description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials – usually from 1 to 20 -  for some naive participants there is a session 0 done to check to check if they chose something at all and took the food.
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
the participants prior experience with a reversed reward contingency task – experienced (those who performed above chance in the last test) / naive (those that did not participate before)
quantity of food placed on the left side
quantity of food placed on the right side
choice the participant made - right / left
whether the participant made correct or incorrect choice
